com.almasb.fxgl.settings

Class GameSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.settings.ReadOnlyGameSettings
      • com.almasb.fxgl.settings.GameSettings

  • public final class GameSettings
extends ReadOnlyGameSettings
    Data structure for variables that are initialised before the application (game) starts.

    Modifying any data after the start of the game has no effect.

    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(String title)
        Set title of the game. This will be shown as the window header if the game isn't fullscreen.
        Parameters:
        title - app title
        Default Value:
        "Untitled FXGL Game Application"

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(int width)
        Set target width. If the screen width is smaller, the game will automatically scale down the image while maintaining the aspect ratio.

        All the game logic must use target width and height.

        Parameters:
        width - target width
        Default Value:
        800

      • setHeight

        public void setHeight(int height)
        Set target height. If the screen height is smaller, the game will automatically scale down the image while maintaining the aspect ratio.

        All the game logic must use target width and height.

        Parameters:
        height - target height
        Default Value:
        600

      • setVersion

        public void setVersion(String version)
        Set version of the game.
        Parameters:
        version - app version
        Default Value:
        0.0

      • setIntroEnabled

        public void setIntroEnabled(boolean b)
        If set to true, the intro video/animation will be played before the start of the game.
        Parameters:
        b - intro flag
        Default Value:
        true

      • setMenuEnabled

        public void setMenuEnabled(boolean b)
        Setting to true enables main and game menu.
        Parameters:
        b - menu flag
        Default Value:
        true

      • setFullScreen

        public void setFullScreen(boolean b)
        Setting to true will start the game in fullscreen mode.
        Parameters:
        b - fullscreen flag
        Default Value:
        false

      • setShowFPS

        public void setShowFPS(boolean b)
        Setting to true will show render and performance FPS in the bottom left corner.
        Parameters:
        b - show fps flag
        Default Value:
        true

      • setProfilingEnabled

        public void setProfilingEnabled(boolean b)
        Setting to true will enable profiler that reports on performance when FXGL exits.
        Parameters:
        b - profiling enabled flag
        Default Value:
        true

      • setApplicationMode

        public void setApplicationMode(ApplicationMode mode)
        Sets application run mode. See ApplicationMode for more info.
        Parameters:
        mode - app mode
        Default Value:
        ApplicationMode#DEVELOPER
